title: Madeline and the soccer star. Madeline and the toy factory.
creator_credit: DIC Entertainment, Family Channel and Stan Phillips
brief_description: Madeline’s country cousin comes to town. Andre is not just a country bumpkin and good gardener but also an excellent soccer player. “Madeline and the soccer star”: Andre saves the day for the girls by winning the big match. “Madeline and the toy factory”: Madeline is accidentally boxed and sold as a doll to a disabled girl. The girl is devastated when Madeline reveals her true identity but soon discovers new friends.
